entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Prévost
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:58 a.m. EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Freezing rain. High zero.
entry.summary: Freezing rain with risk of a thunderstorm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 12:49 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Freezing rain or rain. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to rain after midnight. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Forecast issued 12:49 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain. High 11.
